events.title: Local Fires X The Bygones Book Tour
events.description: Jim Gibson & Joshua Jones read from their acclaimed short story collections with poets & musicians joining to make the night a real party

details.title: Winter Wonderland
details.brief: Christmas comes to Nottingham with a brand-new ice-rink trail, observation wheel, market stalls, ice bar and your favourite food & beverages.
details.description:
Nottingham's premier Christmas entertainment attraction will once again include the Ice Rink and Sky Skate ice path, plus the popular Ice Bar, Sur La Piste and Altitude ski bars.

Open for an extra week this year, Winter Wonderland runs from November until New Year's Eve.
details.locationLong: Old Market Square, Nottingham, United Kingdom

details.title: Local Fires X The Bygones Book Tour
details.brief: Jim Gibson & Joshua Jones read from their acclaimed short story collections with poets & musicians joining to make the night a real party
details.description: The Bygones offers a glimpse into a specific part of the world at a specific time in history. These small stories range from the very real to the very bizarre, taking you on a journey that explores the hidden layers of life and fiction.

details.title: Show What I Have - The 1st World Tour
details.brief: The 5th generation shooting star,IVE is finally making their touring debut. Catch the girl group in their first world tour, Show What I Have.
details.description:
Show What I Have World Tour is the first worldwide concert tour and second tour overall by South Korean girl group Ive, in support of their extended play I've Mine.

The tour began on October 7, 2023, in Seoul, South Korea and is currently set to conclude on August 24, 2024, in Jakarta, Indonesia.
details.locationLong: The O2 Arena, London, United Kingdom

details.title: Trilogy
details.brief: One of the undisputed biggest acts in electronic music today – ILLENIUM – is bringing his renowned Trilogy concert series to Los Angeles at SoFi Stadium on Friday, February 2, 2024.
details.description:
After headlining the largest electronic concert in Colorado's history, ILLENIUM is bringing his three-album showcase to Los Angeles for a doubleheader next year.

The melodic bass superstar is set to bring the third "Trilogy" installment to SoFi Stadium, the home of the NFL's Los Angeles Rams and Chargers, in February 2024. As seen in previous iterations of the series, ILLENIUM will take the stage for three distinct sets that encapsulate all of his albums that led him to become one of the biggest artists in modern-day electronic music.

ILLENIUM will take the stage for his next "Trilogy" event on Friday, February 2nd, 2024.
details.locationLong: SoFi Stadium, Los Angeles, United States

details.title: Hyde Park Winter Wonderland
details.brief: Experience London's magical winter destination. Enjoy ice skating, rides, food, entertainment and more.
details.description:
Located in London’s iconic Hyde Park, Winter Wonderland is the world’s ultimate destination for festive fun. Running for six magical weeks from 17th November 2023 to 1st January 2024, Hyde Park Winter Wonderland offers a variety of attractions, activities, entertainment, food, drinks, and so much more.

From high adrenaline rides to family-friendly performances, classic festive treats to the newest in London’s street food scene, and cosy fire pit bars to mythical ice kingdoms – we guarantee there’s something for everyone. Make the most of your festive season in true Winter Wonderland style!

The event will be open from 10:00am to 10:00pm daily, excluding Christmas Day. Mornings are great for families, where you can explore Winter Wonderland at a leisurely pace. When the evening comes around, Hyde Park is transformed by thousands of sparkling lights – so grab your mulled wine, hot chocolate, or stein of Bavarian beer and get ready to join in the festive fun.

details.title: Tomorrowland Winter
details.brief: Tomorrowland returned to Alpe d’Huez in 2023 for the third edition of Tomorrowland Winter.
details.description: Gathering the world's finest electronic artists at dazzling stages in the village and on the mountains, Tomorrowland once again transformed the mythical village and slopes of Alpe d'Huez into a magical winter fairy tale filled with snow, music, and undiscovered secrets.

details.title: Ultra Music Festival
details.brief: The world's premier electronic music festival, boasting elite DJs and unparalleled production located in the beautiful city of Miami.
details.description: Ultra Music Festival is celebrated every last weekend in March annually and this year, it takes place from March 29 to 31. It began as a ‘little concert on the beach’ more than two decades ago and has grown into one of the world’s largest musical celebrations, attracting the most famous electronic music artists worldwide to the shores of Biscayne Bay in Miami, Florida. Ultra Music Festival, which takes place in the sparkling environment of Downtown Miami, has evolved into a platform for D.Js and producers, where you’re likely to hear new songs from big-name singers performed live for the first time.
details.locationLong: Bayfront Park, Downtown Miami, United States

details.title: Creamfields
details.brief: 2024 will be no exception as the UK's one and only edition returns to the fields of Cheshire from 22nd - 25th August.
details.description:
Creamfields has blazed the trail for electronic dance events over the last 25+ years and cemented its position as one of the world's leading music festivals. Born in 1998, Cream set out to provide the clubbing world with a bespoke largescale outdoor event putting DJ's centre stage for the first time, its flagship UK festival held in Cheshire in the north of England has grown from a 25,000 capacity one day show to the four-day camping behemoth it is today attracting sell out audiences of 70,000 every August Bank Holiday weekend. In addition, the festival stages events around the world throughout the year.

The multi award winning multistage festival is renowned for delivering unbeatable line-ups featuring over 300 of the world's biggest electronic artists . With ground-breaking staging, jaw dropping production, and the festivals unique electric atmosphere all key ingredients to its success, and the reason it continues to attract dance music fans from around the world year after year and remains one of the most hotly anticipated music festivals on the planet. 2024 will be no exception as the UK's one and only edition returns to the fields of Cheshire from 22nd – 25th August.

details.title: New Year's Eve Masquerade Ball
details.brief: Join us at the renowned London Hotel, The Dorchester, as we bid farewell to the year in extravagant fashion with Luxury London Events.
details.description:
Welcome to a mesmerising New Year's Eve at The Dorchester, brought to you by Luxury London Events and Refine Events. This remarkable venue, nestled in the heart of London's prestigious Park Lane, will host our dazzling Masquerade Ball.

Embrace the elegance of this grand event as we bid farewell to the old year and herald the arrival of 2024. Immerse yourself in the rhythm of live music and captivating entertainment, creating an atmosphere that's both lively and refined.

details.title: OfficialKevents | KPOP & KHIPHOP Night
details.brief: Groove to the KPop Beats: Our DJ will spin the hottest K-Pop tracks, from chart-toppers to hidden gems. Get ready to dance the night away to the electrifying beats of your favorite KPop idols.
details.description:
OfficialKEvents is the largest KPop and KHiphop Clubbing Events organiser in the world. Our London & Paris club nights bring in over 2000+ attendees monthly, hosting in 25+ countries. We now bring you an unforgettable night in London at FIRE with 4 rooms of music and outdoor garden space!

Our DJ will spin the hottest K-Pop tracks, from chart-toppers to hidden gems. Get ready to dance the night away to the electrifying beats of your favorite KPop idols.
